pmt_payment_order.id, pmt_payment_order.order_number, pmt_payment_order.business_plantform, pmt_payment_order.payment_client, pmt_payment_order.return_trade_no, pmt_payment_order.status, pmt_payment_order.lock_status, pmt_payment_order.check_status, pmt_payment_order.payment_terminal_type, pmt_payment_order.channel_code, pmt_payment_order.create_time, pmt_payment_order.refund_amount, pmt_payment_order.payment_way_code, pmt_payment_order.selling_channel, pmt_payment_order.message_id, pmt_payment_order.amount, pmt_payment_order.check_time, pmt_payment_order.pay_time, pmt_payment_order.currency, pmt_payment_order.payment_account_id, pmt_payment_order.notification_url, pmt_payment_order.external_order_number, pmt_payment_order.summary, pmt_payment_channel.channel_name paymentChannel_channel_name, pmt_payment_channel.channel_code paymentChannel_channel_code
mapper.insert: insert into pmt_payment_order ( order_number, business_plantform, payment_client, return_trade_no, status, lock_status, check_status, payment_terminal_type, channel_code, create_time, refund_amount, payment_way_code, selling_channel, message_id, amount, check_time, pay_time, currency, payment_account_id, notification_url, external_order_number, summary ) values ( #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessPlantform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentClient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{returnTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, #{lockStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, #{checkStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, #{paymentTerminalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymentWayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellingChannel,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{notificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update pmt_payment_order
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_plantform = #{businessPlantform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_client = #{paymentClient,jdbcType=INTEGER},
return_trade_no = #{returnTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler},
lock_status = #{lockStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler},
check_status = #{checkStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler},
payment_terminal_type = #{paymentTerminalType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
payment_way_code = #{paymentWayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
selling_channel = #{sellingChannel,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler},
message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_account_id = #{paymentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
notification_url = #{notificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
external_order_number = #{externalOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pmt_payment_order set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_plantform = #{businessPlantform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_client = #{paymentClient,jdbcType=INTEGER}, return_trade_no = #{returnTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, lock_status = #{lockStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, check_status = #{checkStatus,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, payment_terminal_type = #{paymentTerminalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_way_code = #{paymentWayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selling_channel = #{sellingChannel,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_account_id = #{paymentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, notification_url = #{notificationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, external_order_number = #{externalOrderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update pmt_payment_order set status = 8 where status != 3 and order_number=#{orderNumber}
mapper.select:
select
from pmt_payment_order left join pmt_payment_order_item on pmt_payment_order_item.payment_order_id = pmt_payment_order.id left join pmt_payment_transaction on pmt_payment_transaction.payment_order_id = pmt_payment_order.id left join pmt_payment_channel on pmt_payment_transaction.payment_channel_id = pmt_payment_channel.id LEFT JOIN pmt_payment_way on pmt_payment_transaction.payment_way_id = pmt_payment_way.id where order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from pmt_payment_order left join pmt_payment_channel on pmt_payment_order.channel_code = pmt_payment_channel.channel_code where order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sum(amount) from pmt_payment_order where status = ${@com.siebre.payment.entity.enums.PaymentOrderPayStatus@PAID.value}
select count(*) from pmt_payment_order where status = ${@com.siebre.payment.entity.enums.PaymentOrderPayStatus@PAID.value}
select sum(amount) from pmt_payment_order where status = ${@com.siebre.payment.entity.enums.PaymentOrderPayStatus@PAYERROR.value}
select count(*) from pmt_payment_order where status = ${@com.siebre.payment.entity.enums.PaymentOrderPayStatus@PAYERROR.value}
select count(*) from pmt_payment_order
select sum(amount) from pmt_payment_order where 1 = 1 and create_time >= #{startDate} and create_time < #{endDate}
select count(*) count, channel_code channelCode from pmt_payment_order where channel_code is not null and status = 3 group by channel_code;
select count(*) count, channel_code channelCode from pmt_payment_order where channel_code is not null and status = 4 group by channel_code;
select sum(amount) totalAmount, channel_code channelCode from pmt_payment_order where 1 = 1 and channel_code is not null and status = 3 group by channel_code;
select sum(amount) totalAmount, channel_code channelCode from pmt_payment_order where 1 = 1 and channel_code is not null and status = 4 group by channel_code;
select count(*) count, payment_way_code paymentWayCode from pmt_payment_order where 1 = 1 and payment_way_code is not null and status = #{status.value} group by payment_way_code;

select paymentChannel.id paymentChannelId, paymentChannel.channel_name paymentChannelName, ifnull(table1.successCount, 0) successCount, ifnull(table1.successAmount, 0) successAmount, ifnull(table2.faildCount, 0) faildCount, ifnull(table2.faildAmount, 0) faildAmount, ifnull(table3.totalCount, 0) totalCount, ifnull(round((successCount * 100 / totalCount) , 2), 0) conversionRate from pmt_payment_channel paymentChannel left join ( select channel_code, count(*) successCount, sum(amount) successAmount from pmt_payment_order where channel_code is not null and status = 3 group by channel_code ) table1 on paymentChannel.channel_code = table1.channel_code left join (select channel_code, count(*) faildCount, sum(amount) faildAmount from pmt_payment_order where channel_code is not null and status = 4 group by channel_code ) table2 on paymentChannel.channel_code = table2.channel_code left join ( select channel_code , count(*) totalCount from pmt_payment_order group by channel_code ) table3 on paymentChannel.channel_code = table3.channel_code
